news_header: An Israeli soldier was sentenced to seven months in prison for abusing Palestinian detainees at a military detention center.
news_original_title: Israeli soldier jailed for abusing Palestinian detainees from Gaza
news_text: An Israeli military court sentenced a soldier to seven months in prison for aggravated abuse of Palestinian detainees at the Sde Teiman detention center. The soldier admitted to multiple incidents of physical abuse, including punching detainees and using his weapon while they were handcuffed and blindfolded. He was the first soldier convicted of such abuses during the ongoing conflict with Hamas. In addition to prison time, he received a suspended sentence and was demoted. The detention center has faced serious abuse allegations since its establishment after the Gaza war began 15 months ago.
